subject: Sex Crimes
Football
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Austin Scott, a suspended Penn State running back, was charged with raping a woman at his campus apartment after meeting her at a bar. Scott was arraigned yesterday on charges of rape, sexual assault and two counts of aggravated indecent assault, all felonies, in connection with the Oct. 5 encounter.
